Object.Description: Recovered in the sands of the desert aroud King Tut's tomb after it been looted.Seems like it retains magical properties.
After the Frog King's Death, you took it's crown;Turns out this Crown is the source of the Frog Kings Power!
A staff that was made by the fabrics of time and space.Thanks to: Life

Object.Description: K is Bae! Thanks to: Devwarlt (and the frog).
Rare skin around the LoE Realm! Thanks to: Devwarlt(and the frog).
After the Dragon King died,you take the remains of it's eyeball and make this jewel.
Compete in the Chinese Festival.Winner gets this op armor!
Defeating the Dragon King,you were rewarded with this ancient chinese helmet.
Bestowed by the Annual Chinese New Year!
A scepter so Hot to the touch, it will instantly Burn whoever touches it.
Donor Perks.

EffectInfo.name: Bonus
EffectInfo.description: This item grant a random item when consumed. Warning: DO NOT USE IN NEXUS! IT WILL DISAPPEAR

Object.Description: A bright blue staff that gains its power from absorbing light.
A ring that contains the blood of their enemies. The crystal contains a very ominous red glow...
A ritual robe used to steal the lives of anything that stands in the way of the ritual.
This orb was used by a bloodthirsty being used to capture other souls. You can hear their souls screaming for help...
A staff, that steals the blood of their victims, along with their soul.
A ring mysteriously made from ice that never melts. It's perfect shape it maintains, but also grants bliss to whoever wears it
A scepter so cold to the touch, it will instantly freeze whoever touches it.
A robe which grants the user an immunity to cold weather, by being one with it.
A wand created by a powerful sorcerer, turns anything into ice.
A mysterious ominous staff, nobody knows about. No one will ever know it's history...
A weapon, that purges those who are unsanitary in spirit.
A bright flame that shines with a ghastly glow, rumored to corrupt those who use it.
Left behind from the Forgotten Kuncoichi,this star holds incredible power.

EffectInfo.description: Speedy on self
Drain 10 MP/sec

Object.Description: A legendary shuriken that absorbs the light around it and turns it into darkness.

EffectInfo.description: Speedy on self
Drain 10 MP/sec

EffectInfo.name: Additional Info
EffectInfo.description: This item is a Super Rare version of Midnight Star.

EffectInfo.name: Black Bag Item
EffectInfo.description: This stuff give +50% additional bonus original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.

Object.Description: Bore of sinew and flesh terrible dreams find their way to light.
It's time to play and to laugh! Have fun with your friends using this incredible and cheerful skin. Thanks to: NPEtoPPEx.
GET BANNED.
Forged from Lava and Rocks,out comes this ring.
After the Demonic Demon Mage died,her robe was left behind.
This skull glows with the blue energy of plasma.
Forged from the most deadliest Volcano,this staff holds the power of pure fire itself.
The expo modified!!!
Made in China.
Made by the materials of a nuclear bomb,this quiver is just as deadly...
The most modern bow of all,fear the latest techonolgy of CHINA.
Only the strongest of all ninja is worthy of this skin! Thanks to: NPEtoPPEx and Devwarlt(and the frog).
One of Dr.Terrible's inventions.
After digging around in the Ice mountains of the Artic,they found this.
Along with the quiver,this bow is slow, but does OP damage.
After the Heavenly Monk passed,its robe was left behind.
Able to read the thoughts of your mind,this seal will control you.
Customize your Wizard with the Dragon Skin.
Customize your Assassin with the Frog King Skin.
Only the strongest of all Palidin can attain this! Thanks to:Filisha.
A shield from a place beyond the gates of war and peace.Protected the mightest Angels against the Darkness.
Worn by the Angel of Light,this armor holds amazing power.
The bane of one's childhood..
A horrifically dangerous spell, made in Alantis by Posideon himself containing godly power.
Cut from a fallen star, Fell by the feet of Filisha who fused it to make a ring of awesomeness.

EffectInfo.name: Additional Info
EffectInfo.description: This item is a super rare version of Ring of Decades.

Object.Description: A ring forged by the mad god in the sorrows of man's anger. Its magic protects its owner from some harm. Original Design by DieGo.
Soaked in the nightmares of the children of the world,this armor is boosted with death and sorrow...
Corrupted by creatures of the netherworld, its arrows will slacken assailants promptly.
A bow half ressurected,exsisting only as a mirage and a weapon.
Aliens from outer space donated this weapon as part of the treaty that ended the Space Wars.
This is a reward of Blue Star Package.

Object.Description: Not even the most wise kings are able to use this ring. Only the most courageous and fearless warriors can use it! Thanks to: Solceon.

Neither the mad god's sword is able to pierce that armor! Guarded the gates of the depths of the Ice Cave, human returned from there with even more mystery about this legendary artifact. Thanks to: Solceon.
A magnificent shield forged over a thousand centuries by Yetis returned to resonate the voices of Nexus peasants. Thanks to: Solceon.
Built in Arctic ice crystals, formed a new material capable of withstanding high temperatures as Abyss of the Demos and the most intense cold of the Ice Cave! Thanks to: Solsceon.
A bow made from bone marrow.
A quiver made from the skulls of malphas flamers.
Armor made from the ribcage of a skeleton
An amulet cursed by all who haunt the ether.
The Oryx servants are terrified in the presence of this equipment!
